name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Anya Melfissa performs a cover of 'Wasureji no Kotonoha'.
Transition between songs with a black screen and instrumental intro.
MC section where Anya introduces herself and welcomes the audience.

subtitles.original: 忘れじの言の葉
